title: A Simple Recipe for Fake Blood Capsules

steps.title: Syrup, water, and food coloring all that you need.
steps.content: Syrup, water, and food coloring all that you need. Mix together the following ingredients: 10 milliliters (0.34 fl oz) of golden syrup (any kind that is not dark syrup), 5ml or teaspoon of water, 2 drops of red food colouring, 2 drops of blue food colouring and 1 drop of yellow food colouring. Mix everything together in a jug. If you wish, you may add a pinch of cocoa powder for a deeper red colour.

steps.title: Carefully pour the fake blood mixture into it until it is full or half full.
steps.content: Carefully pour the fake blood mixture into it until it is full or half full. When you have filled each capsule sufficiently, place the top back on and close it tightly. [1] X Research source The kind of capsule you're looking for is an empty gel capsule . These can be found at most vitamin stores.

steps.title: Repeat this same process to make more capsules.
steps.content: Repeat this same process to make more capsules.

steps.title: Let it warm up before breaking it in your mouth.
steps.content: Let it warm up before breaking it in your mouth. [2] X Research source
